welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tangjia, China! This charming city is known for its beautiful gardens, traditional architecture, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tangjia has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 向阳柴火灶主题餐厅
restaurants.description: 向阳柴火灶主题餐厅 is a zhejiang restaurant located in Huchow.

restaurants.description: 天目湖宾馆 is a chinese restaurant located in 溧阳.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Macau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most advanced terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 3-hour time limit per device. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shenzhen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Shenzhen Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free for the first hour, additional time can be purchased.
